name: ralim
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c0, w1)))

stmt.origin: ral2imi(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1), w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c0, w1)))
